name: ProtonJon Pinball
description:
This is a non official Proton Jon themed Pinball game (non official in that its just a fan game themed around RosaJon mostly)

there are some glitches where the ball ignores physics and goes through the wall but the great space waifu will return you ball and reward this random act of luck. Controls can be changed with the buttons in the bottom left. There is no game over just infinite pinball.


if you are in the gravity of a blue bumper hold down the launcher button to deactivate its gravitational pull. Otherwise besides the double ended flippers its normal Pinball in the works!

Bug reports, and ideas are welcome! (things like The ball went through the wall and never came back or it got stuck)

as well as ideas like put a bumper here or a thingy there.

anyone that would like to help make art for it is also welcome to join!

Thank you for your time and hope you enjoy!

Update:10/30/2020

Point Panels are added have the ball roll over them to activate events, some are purely points. but others may alter the Pinball Board or even the ball.
On a completely unrelated note BIGGER MODE is now a feature and yes if you get big YOU CAN GET BIGGER!




ALSO THIS IS STILL EARLY DEV I started this on the 28th of October
